data.title: Team of the Season in Football Ultimate Team™
data.meta_description: Celebrate this season’s top performers with Team of the Season (TOTS) in EA SPORTS FC™ 24 Football Ultimate Team.
data.text:
TOTS REWARD CHANGES

As is customary, Team of the Season refreshes rewards across all of Football Ultimate Team’s core modes. Below, we’ll detail what’s new across Champions, Squad Battles and Rivals.

This year TOTS Red Items make a return to mode rewards via Champions, Squad Battles and Rivals rewards. You’ll be able to earn red TOTS versions of football’s top Men’s & Women’s Leagues players each week of the campaign. This will also include TOTS Moments, TOTS Live and TOTS Plus players.

Starting today you’ll begin to see some updates taking place in modes across Ultimate Team as we update rewards across Champions, Rivals & Squad Battles to celebrate the arrival of Team of the Season (TOTS).

CHAMPIONS

Champions mode rewards will be updated on Friday, April 19th 2024.

To make sure you’re earning the latest TOTS rewards available in packs, we will delay the start of the Ultimate Team Champions Final event until 8PM BST and extend the event by 24 hours, finishing at 8AM BST.

In some ranks, TOTS Red reward packs will include player items from select releases or Leagues. In other ranks there will be All TOTS Red rewards, that will include all Red TOTS players released in the campaign so far. Below are the TOTS Leagues that will start being available as rewards each weekend. You’ll be able to see the full details of the Champions Finals reward changes in-game in the coming days.

SQUAD BATTLES

Squad Battles mode rewards will be updated on Sunday, April 21st 2024.

Below is the schedule for TOTS league releases. Here you can see which league’s TOTS items will be available as rewards each weekend. In some ranks there will be All-league TOTS Red rewards that will include Red TOTS players from the campaign so far. In other ranks, TOTS Red reward packs will include player items from select releases or Leagues. You’ll be able to see the full details of the Squad Battles reward changes in-game in the coming days.

RIVALS

Rivals mode rewards will be updated on Thursday, April 25th 2024

Starting with the Season 6 launch on April 25th 2024, TOTS themed rewards will be added to Rivals’ Weekly Rewards for Divisions 4 & above. This means you can compete to earn Champions Red Item Player Picks or Guarantee Packs every week throughout Season 6, depending on your division and rank.

Elite: TOTS Red Pick (1 of 5)

Division 1: TOTS Red Pick (1 of 4)

Division 2: TOTS Red Pick (1 of 3)

Division 3: TOTS Red Guarantee

Division 4: Max 90 TOTS Red Guarantee.

TEAM OF THE SEASON

Team of the Season in FC 24 introduces new measures of authenticity. Squad selections have been constructed in collaboration with individual domestic leagues using detailed metrics from Stats Perform’s Opta, on each TOTS player’s performance this season throughout global football. This season’s TOTS players will be backed by not just the eye test but also have the stats to match. TOTS Verified, indeed.

TOTS LIVE

For the first time ever, Team of the Season will kick off with a group of special dynamic items. TOTS Live items will have an opportunity to receive upgrades based on the real-world performance of their clubs as we reach the business end of the season. These items will have a bespoke TOTS Item Shell design (see below):

The upgrade path for this group of players is as follows:

Live TOTS Upgrades:

2 Wins in the next 4 League Games (+1 OVR Upgrade)

The Player's Club Scores 8 Goals in the next 4 League Games (+1 OVR Upgrade)

(Upgrade eligibility is the next 4 league games starting from Friday April 19th, 2024)

Triple Playstyles+

Team of the Season introduces Triple Playstyles+ for the very first time. Starting with Live TOTS select Team of the Season items will have x3 Playstyles+, taking the standout players of the FC 24 Season to new heights.

TOTS PLUS

Starting on April 26th 2024, select Items will have TOTS Plus Chemistry. These will exist across a selection of Women’s Leagues and Mixed League TOTS items’ throughout the campaign. The players possessing TOTS Plus Chemistry will have improved links with their league to help you integrate them into your squad more easily. The Chemistry profile for these players will be as follows:

TOTS Plus Chemistry Profile:

1 Club Link

5 League Links

1 Nation Link

TOTS Plus player items will be on at least 2 Chemistry Points in position.

See the TOTS Plus and TOTS Plus Red Item Shells below:

TOTS MIXED LEAGUES

This cycle, certain league TOTS items will be paired together each week in a mixed squad release in packs alongside the Women’s and Men’s top-flight TOTS items. Please see the list of potential leagues included in the mixed league releases below:

Eredivisie

Super Lig

Liga Portugal

MLS

EFL

Roshn Saudi League

Scotland Premiership

Germany 2. Bundesliga

Switzerland Super League

Austria Bundesliga

Poland Ekstraklasa

Sweden Allsvenskan

Belgian Pro League

CREATE YOUR OWN TOTS CONTENT

Celebrate some of the best players this season in EA SPORTS FC 24 with your very own Team of the Season Creator toolkit. Hit the download link below to start creating your own video content with a fresh TOTS look.
